name: Beets
description: Beets is a music library manager and MusicBrainz tagger. It catalogs your collection, automatically improving metadata, fetching album art, lyrics, and organizing files with a customizable naming scheme. Includes acoustic fingerprinting via Chromaprint for identifying unknown tracks.

notes.text: Beets is primarily a CLI tool. Run 'beet --help' for commands.
Mount your music library to /media/music or edit /opt/beets/config.yaml
Enable web UI with: systemctl enable --now beets-web
